contest-event.event-date:
July 27, 1901 D Trawden Contest
Trawden Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
trawden-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Trawden, Colne, Lancashire Prizes: £15, £10, £5.10s., £3, £1. Best - L.Wilson (Haslingden) Best trombone - W.Lawson (Haslingden) Best euphonium - E.Calverley (Irwell Springs) Best soprano - L.Atkinson (Crooke) March contest - 1st(£1) Crooke, 2nd(10s.)Haslingden.
Choice of test pieces: "Crispino", "Belisario" or "Songs of Scotland" 8 bands entered but only 5 competed.
Aug. 15, 2013, 7:40 p.m. April 15, 2020, 9:34 a.m.
1 Haslingden Borough Band J. J. Hargreaves Songs of Scotland
2 Standish Band Peter Fairhurst Belisario [arr. Godfrey]
3 Irwell Bank Edward Gittins Songs of Scotland
4 Irwell Springs J. Nuttall Belisario [arr. Godfrey]
5 Colne Mount Zion J. J. Titherington Crispino [arr. Round]
Withdrawn Clayton le Moors Alexander Owen
Withdrawn Oldham Rifles Band Alexander Owen
Withdrawn Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band William Rimmer
